prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a vibrant red shell and a flexible yellow neck.
Imagine a small, quirky creature that can hide inside its shell for protection.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a unique, round body shape.
Design a Pokemon with a playful personality and bright colors that attract attention.
Generate a creature with a distinctive shell and a long neck that coils around.
I want an adorable Pokemon with a combination of red and yellow that feels rare.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a turtle but has an unusual color pattern.
